alert.note: Alert for Cass; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 4:06PM EDT until March 25 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Eel River at North Manchester affecting Wabash, Miami, Cass IN, Whitley and Kosciusko Counties. .Heavy rainfall near 2 inches over the last 24 hours has resulted in rising water on the Eel River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eel River at North Manchester. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river is at flood stage, minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 PM EDT Thursday was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
